title: Gross domestic product in Catalonia and Spain 2003 to 2017
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Catalonia, and Spain. The y axis represents GDP in million euros and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Catalonia, and Spain are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Spain, and lastly, 2. Catalonia.
Overall across the Year, Spain mostly maintained the highest GDP in million euros when compared to others with a mean value of 1033076.2, and it peaked at 2017.
Catalonia mostly had the least GDP in million euros with a mean value of 203604.2, which peaked at 2017 with a value of 234651.0.

max_summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Catalonia, and Spain. The y axis indicates the GDP in million euros and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Catalonia, and Spain are gradually increasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Spain, and lastly, 2. Catalonia.

The botommost line, Catalonia,  has a mean of 203604.2, and peaked at 2017.
Catalonia reported the lowest GDP in million euros about 156600.0 in Year 2003
The difference of GDP in million euros between Catalonia and Spain is greater at Year 2017 compared to the Year 2003.
